properties.functionParameters: starttime:datetime=datetime(null), endtime:datetime=datetime(null), srcipaddr:string='*',domain:string='*', responsecodename:string='*', response:string='*', eventtype:string='lookup'
properties.query: union isfuzzy=true vimDnsEmpty(starttime, endtime, srcipaddr,domain, responsecodename, response, eventtype), vimDnsCiscoUmbrella(starttime, endtime, srcipaddr,domain, responsecodename, response, eventtype) , vimDnsInfobloxNIOS(starttime, endtime, srcipaddr,domain, responsecodename, response, eventtype) , vimDnsMicrosoftOMS(starttime, endtime, srcipaddr,domain, responsecodename, response, eventtype)
